Then the LORD<S>3068</S> said<S>559</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, Now shalt thou see<S>7200</S> what I will do<S>6213</S> to Pharaoh<S>6547</S>: for with a strong<S>2389</S> hand<S>3027</S> shall he let them go<S>7971</S>, and with a strong<S>2389</S> hand<S>3027</S> shall he drive them out<S>1644</S> of his land<S>776</S>.
And God<S>430</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, and said<S>559</S> unto him, I am the LORD<S>3068</S>: <sup>the LORD: or, JEHOVAH</sup>
And I appeared<S>7200</S> unto Abraham<S>85</S>, unto Isaac<S>3327</S>, and unto Jacob<S>3290</S>, by the name of God<S>410</S> Almighty<S>7706</S>, but by my name<S>8034</S> JEHOVAH<S>3068</S> was I not known<S>3045</S> to them.
And I have also established<S>6965</S> my covenant<S>1285</S> with them, to give<S>5414</S> them the land<S>776</S> of Canaan<S>3667</S>, the land<S>776</S> of their pilgrimage<S>4033</S>, wherein they were strangers<S>1481</S>.
And I have also heard<S>8085</S> the groaning<S>5009</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, whom<S>834</S> the Egyptians<S>4714</S> keep in bondage<S>5647</S>; and I have remembered<S>2142</S> my covenant<S>1285</S>.
Wherefore<S>3651</S> say<S>559</S> unto the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, I am the LORD<S>3068</S>, and I will bring<S>3318</S> you out from under the burdens<S>5450</S> of the Egyptians<S>4714</S>, and I will rid<S>5337</S> you out of their bondage<S>5656</S>, and I will redeem<S>1350</S> you with a stretched<S>5186</S> out arm<S>2220</S>, and with great<S>1419</S> judgments<S>8201</S>:
And I will take<S>3947</S> you to me for a people<S>5971</S>, and I will be to you a God<S>430</S>: and ye shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S>, which bringeth<S>3318</S> you out from under the burdens<S>5450</S> of the Egyptians<S>4714</S>.
And I will bring<S>935</S> you in unto the land<S>776</S>, concerning the which I did swear<S>5375</S> <S>3027</S> to give<S>5414</S> it to Abraham<S>85</S>, to Isaac<S>3327</S>, and to Jacob<S>3290</S>; and I will give<S>5414</S> it you for an heritage<S>4181</S>: I am the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>swear: Heb. lift up my hand</sup>
And Moses<S>4872</S> spake<S>1696</S> so unto the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: but they hearkened<S>8085</S> not unto Moses<S>4872</S> for anguish<S>7115</S> of spirit<S>7307</S>, and for cruel<S>7186</S> bondage<S>5656</S>. <sup>anguish: Heb. shortness, or, straitness</sup>
And the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Go<S>935</S> in, speak<S>1696</S> unto Pharaoh<S>6547</S> king<S>4428</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, that he let the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> go out<S>7971</S> of his land<S>776</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> spake<S>1696</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, saying<S>559</S>, Behold, the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> have not hearkened<S>8085</S> unto me; how then shall Pharaoh<S>6547</S> hear<S>8085</S> me<S>589</S>, who am of uncircumcised<S>6189</S> lips<S>8193</S>?
And the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S> and unto Aaron<S>175</S>, and gave them a charge<S>6680</S> unto the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and unto Pharaoh<S>6547</S> king<S>4428</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, to bring<S>3318</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> out of the land<S>776</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>.
These be the heads<S>7218</S> of their fathers'<S>1</S> houses<S>1004</S>: The sons<S>1121</S> of Reuben<S>7205</S> the firstborn<S>1060</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>; Hanoch<S>2585</S>, and Pallu<S>6396</S>, Hezron<S>2696</S>, and Carmi<S>3756</S>: these be the families<S>4940</S> of Reuben<S>7205</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Simeon<S>8095</S>; Jemuel<S>3223</S>, and Jamin<S>3226</S>, and Ohad<S>161</S>, and Jachin<S>3199</S>, and Zohar<S>6714</S>, and Shaul<S>7586</S> the son<S>1121</S> of a Canaanitish woman<S>3669</S>: these are the families<S>4940</S> of Simeon<S>8095</S>.
And these are the names<S>8034</S> of the sons<S>1121</S> of Levi<S>3878</S> according to their generations<S>8435</S>; Gershon<S>1648</S>, and Kohath<S>6955</S>, and Merari<S>4847</S>: and the years<S>8141</S> of the life<S>2416</S> of Levi<S>3878</S> were an hundred<S>3967</S> thirty<S>7970</S> and seven<S>7651</S> years<S>8141</S>.
The sons<S>1121</S> of Gershon<S>1648</S>; Libni<S>3845</S>, and Shimi<S>8096</S>, according to their families<S>4940</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Kohath<S>6955</S>; Amram<S>6019</S>, and Izhar<S>3324</S>, and Hebron<S>2275</S>, and Uzziel<S>5816</S>: and the years<S>8141</S> of the life<S>2416</S> of Kohath<S>6955</S> were an hundred<S>3967</S> thirty<S>7970</S> and three<S>7969</S> years<S>8141</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Merari<S>4847</S>; Mahali<S>4249</S> and Mushi<S>4187</S>: these are the families<S>4940</S> of Levi<S>3878</S> according to their generations<S>8435</S>.
And Amram<S>6019</S> took<S>3947</S> him Jochebed<S>3115</S> his father's sister<S>1733</S> to wife<S>802</S>; and she bare<S>3205</S> him Aaron<S>175</S> and Moses<S>4872</S>: and the years<S>8141</S> of the life<S>2416</S> of Amram<S>6019</S> were an hundred<S>3967</S> and thirty<S>7970</S> and seven<S>7651</S> years<S>8141</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Izhar<S>3324</S>; Korah<S>7141</S>, and Nepheg<S>5298</S>, and Zichri<S>2147</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Uzziel<S>5816</S>; Mishael<S>4332</S>, and Elzaphan<S>469</S>, and Zithri<S>5644</S>.
And Aaron<S>175</S> took<S>3947</S> him Elisheba<S>472</S>, daughter<S>1323</S> of Amminadab<S>5992</S>, sister<S>269</S> of Naashon<S>5177</S>, to wife<S>802</S>; and she bare<S>3205</S> him Nadab<S>5070</S>, and Abihu<S>30</S>, Eleazar<S>499</S>, and Ithamar<S>385</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Korah<S>7141</S>; Assir<S>617</S>, and Elkanah<S>511</S>, and Abiasaph<S>23</S>: these are the families<S>4940</S> of the Korhites<S>7145</S>.
And Eleazar<S>499</S> Aaron's<S>175</S> son<S>1121</S> took<S>3947</S> him one of the daughters<S>1323</S> of Putiel<S>6317</S> to wife<S>802</S>; and she bare<S>3205</S> him Phinehas<S>6372</S>: these are the heads<S>7218</S> of the fathers<S>1</S> of the Levites<S>3881</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>.
These<S>1931</S> are that Aaron<S>175</S> and Moses<S>4872</S>, to whom<S>834</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> said<S>559</S>, Bring out<S>3318</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> from the land<S>776</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S> according to their armies<S>6635</S>.
These<S>1992</S> are they which spake<S>1696</S> to Pharaoh<S>6547</S> king<S>4428</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, to bring out<S>3318</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> from Egypt<S>4714</S>: these are that Moses<S>4872</S> and Aaron<S>175</S>.
And it came to pass on the day<S>3117</S> when the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>,
That the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, saying<S>559</S>, I am the LORD<S>3068</S>: speak<S>1696</S> thou unto Pharaoh<S>6547</S> king<S>4428</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S> all that I say<S>1696</S> unto thee.
And Moses<S>4872</S> said<S>559</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, Behold, I am of uncircumcised<S>6189</S> lips<S>8193</S>, and how shall Pharaoh<S>6547</S> hearken<S>8085</S> unto me?
